desc: Gems from Paradise Inc. is a customized product design business focusing on one-of-a-kind, handcrafted accessories that speak to us expressing our authentic selves. Whether it be jewellery, bags or socks, our unique, individual style shows the world who we are and what we stand for.

layout.text: Make an impression by showing the world who you are and what you stand for with one-of-a-kind, handcrafted designs.
